When you start you cannot play for 1 week, win 2 games and get cooldown 24hr. When you finally get your rank and can play, toxic russians report you for griefing just to grief you. After 2 reports you get cooldown again, first 2 hours then 2 days, then 1 week.

Dont buy this game since you cannot play it.

I wouldn't recommend.  Can easily get banned even when you don't cheat.  If your account gets hacked, you get perma banned.  As soon as I was able to get my account back from the hacker, my account was already banned from CS.  Can't recommend this just because of this issue.  Doesn't even matter if you can prove that your account was hacked and secured afterwards.
